title: Best of The Dan Patrick Show
itunes:title: Best of The Dan Patrick Show
description:
On Today's Dan Patrick Show, ESPN's Louis Riddick helps preview tonight's Browns/Steelers game. Which team needs the win more? ESPN NBA Insider Ramona Shelburne shares insight into the Robert Sarver/Suns and Ime Udoka allegation situations. And Reds 1st Baseman Joey Votto explains why he watched some of the Reds game from the stands yesterday. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
